00012 #ifndef __WIDGET_FACTORY_H__
00013 #define __WIDGET_FACTORY_H__
00014 
00015 #include "outk/ui/Box.h"
00016 #include "outk/ui/Button.h"
00017 #include "outk/ui/Widget.h"
00018 
00019 namespace outk
00020 {
00021 namespace ui
00022 {
00024 class WidgetFactory
00025 {
00026 public:
00027         virtual Widget* createWidget(omega::String name, Widget* parent)
00028         {
00029                 Widget* widget = new Widget(name);
00030                 parent->addChild(widget);
00031                 return widget;
00032         }
00033 
00034         virtual Box* createBox(omega::String name, Widget* parent, Box::Layout layout)
00035         {
00036                 Box* box = new Box(name, layout);
00037                 parent->addChild(box);
00038                 return box;
00039         }
00040 
00041         virtual Button* createButton(omega::String name, Widget* parent)
00042         {
00043                 Button* button = new Button(name);
00044                 parent->addChild(button);
00045                 return button;
00046         }
00047 };
00048 }; // namespace ui
00049 }; // namespace outk
00050 
00051 #endif
